location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Site Plan Proposed Indian Assistant’s Court at Bahrain’

mods.abstract: This blueprint drawing is a site plan of the proposed Indian Assistant’s Court within the grounds of the Political Agency compound in Bahrain.The plan is labelled with information including the names of the rooms, measurements, and the reference ‘Drawing No. 10 of 1936’.The plan was created by the Assistant Engineer, Independent Persian Gulf Sub-Division.Scale: 25 feet to 1 inch.
